📅 Arrive at least two weeks before classes for timely Student’s Pass processing with ICA. You’ll receive an email from stpformalitiessingapore@jcu.edu.au with your Student Pass Collection appointment details.
⏳ Be punctual to avoid delays.

📅 To ensure timely Student’s Pass processing with ICA, arrive at least two weeks before classes. You will receive an email from stpformalitiessingapore@jcu.edu.au with your Student Pass collection details.
⏳ Be on time to avoid delays.

📅 Arrive 2 weeks before classes for ICA’s timely Student’s Pass processing. Check your email from stpformalitiessingapore@jcu.edu.au for collection details.
⏳ Arrive on time to prevent delays.
🩺 If you've already had a medical check-up in your home country, you don't need another one in Singapore.
🩺 No additional medical check-up is required in Singapore if you've completed one in your home country.
🩺 A medical check-up in Singapore is unnecessary if you've already done one in your home country.
